plot: Hodiak, Brian, Derek and Teal have just been released from prison. They return to Tomahawk Gap, now a ghost town, to retrieve the money that they stole and was buried by a partner somewhere in the town. While hunting, the Indians attack, and a life and death battle ensues.   Written by  Terry Brooks
title: Ambush at Tomahawk Gap
plot_es: Hodiak, Brian, Derek and Teal have just been released from prison.
